definition: lit. to kill people like scything flax (idiom)/fig. to kill people like flies
to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely
generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb

sentences.english: They are both grinding teeth to suck blood.
You think a man who butchers people for the mob doesn't belong in jail?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲這個殺人如麻的人不屬於監獄麼？

sentences.english: We're a murderous bunch of pirates, remember?
sentences.chinese: 咱們是殺人如麻的海盜，你忘了啊？
